none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 19, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
This is from the Bay Area? I include the question mark as emphasis to my own fucking self because I need to not let things slip by me. Pure and primitive Spanish language hardcore fucking punk in five fierce movements...check the beginning of "Severed Head" and that out of tune guitar ringing out before the drums ramshackle the shit out of you Monday and you'll feel my pain. I want more.  CONTRA CONTROL

seo.title: Contra Control - EP cassette 2017 - Terminal Escape
